description: Capacitate operațională disponibilă - determină pragmatismul soluțiilor, tool stack assumptions și implementation approach

minimal.label: Minimal Resources
minimal.description: Resurse foarte limitate, focus pe solutions gratuite/low-cost
minimal.tool_stack: free tools, basic subscriptions, manual processes
minimal.timeline_factor: slower execution due to resource constraints

solo.label: Solo Operator
solo.description: O persoană full-time cu buget modest pentru tools
solo.tool_stack: productivity tools, basic SaaS subscriptions, some automation
solo.implementation_approach: efficient solo workflows, selective tool investment

lean_team.label: Lean Team
lean_team.description: Echipă mică 2-5 persoane cu buget controlat
lean_team.tool_stack: team collaboration tools, mid-tier SaaS, some custom development

agency_stack.label: Agency Stack
agency_stack.description: Agenție cu tools profesionale și procese stabilite
agency_stack.tool_stack: professional tools, automation platforms, client management systems

full_stack_org.label: Full Stack Organization
full_stack_org.description: Organizație cu departamente multiple și buget substanțial
full_stack_org.tool_stack: enterprise software, custom development, integrated systems

enterprise_budget.label: Enterprise Budget
enterprise_budget.description: Resources practic nelimitate, focus pe quality și compliance
enterprise_budget.tool_stack: enterprise-grade everything, custom development, unlimited tools

complexity_constraints.minimal: avoid complex solutions requiring expensive tools
complexity_constraints.lean_team: scalable solutions that don't require large teams

mismatch_warnings.enterprise + minimal: Enterprise scale incompatible with minimal resources
mismatch_warnings.personal_brand + enterprise_budget: Resource overkill for personal brand scale

minimal.focus: free/low-cost solutions, manual processes, detailed step-by-step

solo.focus: efficiency tools, personal productivity, selective automation

lean_team.focus: team collaboration, scalable processes, mid-tier tools

agency_stack.focus: client delivery, professional tools, systematized processes

full_stack_org.focus: enterprise integration, cross-functional coordination, robust systems

enterprise_budget.focus: enterprise-grade solutions, compliance, unlimited tool access
enterprise_budget.avoid: budget constraints, manual workarounds, simple tools
